New Records: Phil Salt scored 87* runs for England, the highest score in the match
Key Match Events: Brandon King was forced to retire hurt with a side strain in the fifth over
Roston Chase got Jos Buttler out lbw for 25
Phil Salt clobbered Romario Shepherd for three 6s and three 4s in the 16th over
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell opted to revert to the XI that produced wins over Papua New Guinea, Uganda and New Zealand
Shai Hope and Obed McCoy gave way to the returning Roston Chase and Romario Shepherd
Post-Match Reflections: Powell expressed hope that King can 'pull through' to face USA and South Africa
Powell expressed that West Indies 'needed a better display as a bowling group'
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies' eight-match winning streak ended with defeat to England
England won the match by eight wickets
